verses.roman:
jagannātha kaiche kariyāchena bhojana
āji saba mahāprasāda kara āsvādana

synonyms: jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; kaiche—as; kariyāchena—has accepted; bhojana—lunch; āji—today; saba—all of you; mahā-prasāda—the remnants of food offered to the Lord; kara—do; āsvādana—tasting.
translation: "Today, all of you please try to taste the lunch just as Lord Jagannātha accepted it."
